hu.accessories_config_message: Accessories are defined by the plugins you have installed. Refer to the plugin's documentation for further instructions. Accessories are intended to define a single device.
hu.accessories_message: Add and order the accessories that belong to this room.
hu.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
hu.available_accessories_message: Select the accessories you want to add to this room.
hu.backup_message: Take a snapshot and download your current configuration.
hu.bridge_settings_message: This section identifies Homebridge on the system and in Apple Home.
hu.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
hu.country_code_message: Set the country code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
hu.default_screen_message: Set the default screen to show when logging in.
hu.dns_cache_stale: iOS DNS cache has gone stale or gotten misconfigured. Try turning airplane mode on and back off to flush the DNS cache.
hu.end_port_invalid: End port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
hu.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
hu.home_pin_message: The PIN used when adding Homebridge to Apple Home.
hu.home_username_message: The username Apple Home uses to identify Homebridge.
hu.homebridge_service_clash: The Homebridge service thinks it's paired, but iOS thinks otherwise. Try resetting the connection with the button below. This will delete the persist folder.
hu.homebridge_service_not_running: The Homebridge service is not running. Try starting the service. Check the Status screen and if the Homebridge service is not running, click the service menu on the upper right and click Start Service.
hu.homebridge_stuck: iOS has gotten your Homebridge username stuck somehow, where it's in the database but inactive. Try regenerating the Homebridge username.
hu.homekit_disconnect: This will disconnect Homebridge from Apple Home. You will need to re-pair.
hu.id_message: This section uniquely identifies the user.
hu.interface_settings_message: This section defines the interface look and feel.
hu.invalid_inactive_logoff: Invalid inactive timeout, must be between 5 and 60.
hu.invalid_port_range: Invalid port range the ending port must be greater then the starting port.
hu.language_message: Set the interface language or set it to auto to use the your browser's language.
hu.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
hu.log_out_after_message: Define how long you stay logged in without activity, in minutes.
hu.login_to_fix: Please login as an administrator to fix.
hu.login_to_update: A frissítések ellenőrzéséhez jelentkezz be adminisztrátorként.
hu.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
hu.name: Név
hu.online_help_message: The best place to get help is online. We have many step-by-step guides that can help troubleshoot most issues.
hu.package_not_found: This package was not found on NPM.
hu.password_weak:
A jelszó nem elég erős.
A jelszó túl gyenge.
hu.permissions_message: This section defines what this user can do on the system.
hu.platforms_message: Platforms are defined by the plugins you have installed. Refer to the plugin's documentation for further instructions. Platforms are intended to define a group of devices (like a hub).
hu.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
hu.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
hu.port_ranges_message: This section is used to control the range of ports that separate accessories (like camera or television) should be bound to.
hu.postal_code_message: Set the postal code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
hu.range_name_message: A port range description used to identify the port range.
hu.reenter_password:
Jelszó ismét
Ismételje meg a jelszót
hu.restore_message: Select a system backup to restore the system to a previous state.
hu.restore_warning: Restoring the system will delete your current configuration.
hu.room_name_message: Define the name of your room.
hu.security_message: Set or change this user's password here.
hu.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
hu.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
hu.server_settings_message: This section controls the server. These settings require a device reboot
hu.service_description_message: Used with the name to help identify the Homebridge on the system.
hu.service_name_message: Used to identify the Homebridge service on the system.
hu.service_port_invalid: Service port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
hu.service_port_message: The port Homebridge runs on, the default is 51826.
hu.setup_admin_account: To start you need to setup the administrator account.
hu.setup_id_message: From the Apple Home app, scan this eight-digit code, or enter manually.
hu.setup_user_account: To start you need to setup a user account.
hu.show_setup_pin_message: This will show or hide the Apple Home setup PIN and QR code on the status screen.
hu.start_port_invalid: Start port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
hu.stay_up_to_date: Stay up-to-date. Updating helps keep your setup running healthy. Try checking for updates from the system menu.
hu.temp_units_message: Set the units you want temprature sensors to display.
hu.theme_message: Choose a theme for the interface.
hu.unassigned_accessories_message: These accessories are not assigned to a room.
